entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
